postBootScript: yum install -y wget; wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/flynet/flynet_mobius_start.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW all; git clone https://github.com/kthare10/flynetDemo.git /root/flynetDemo; cd /root/flynetDemo/; git checkout -b mobius; git pull origin mobius;cd worker/;sh worker.sh STARTIP WORKERS > /var/log/worker.log 2>&1
